column4: hello - i  just installed ubuntu 11.10 now on my dell inspiron 1525 and i cant work with the WIFI - any help please

do you know what pastebin is?
run this command: sudo lspci -k       and copy / paste the output into this site: paste.ubuntu.com   and give me the link to the page it goes to when you submit

sudo apt-get install libnss3-1d     (we might need to install several packages before this works)
run this: sudo apt-get install libnss3-1d and then try to install chrome again
